accelerator_id.description: Specifies the ID of the global accelerator associated with the listener.

client_affinity.description:
|-
                    Specifies the client affinity. The value can be one of the following:
                      - **Source IP address**: Requests from the same IP address are forwarded to the same endpoint.
                      - **NONE**: Requests are evenly forwarded across the endpoints.

created_at.description: Specifies when the listener was created.

description.description:
|-
                    Specifies the information about the listener. The value can contain 0 to 255 characters.
                    The following characters are not allowed: <>

frozen_info.description: The frozen details of cloud services or resources.

name.description:
|-
                    Specifies the listener name. The name can contain 1 to 64 characters.
                    Only letters, digits, and hyphens (-) are allowed.

protocol.description: Specifies the protocol used by the listener to forward requests.

status.description:
|-
                    Specifies the provisioning status. The value can be one of the following:
                      - **ACTIVE**: The resource is running.
                      - **PENDING**: The status is to be determined.
                      - **ERROR**: Failed to create the resource.
                      - **DELETING**: The resource is being deleted.

updated_at.description: Specifies when the listener was updated.

block.description: Specifies the port range used by the listener.
